architectural entities (and their resources)
    origin API
        NPM public registry API
            resources
                /{package}
                /{package}/{version}
                /-/v1/search
                    parameters
                        text
                        size
                        from
                        quality
                        popularity

    proxy API
        resources
            public
                /registeration
                    input
                        username
                    operations
                        sequence
                            API server
                                route handler
                                    create new user object
                                        generate API key
                                        init usage count
                                DB client
                                    send INSERT query to DB server
                            DB server
                                INSERT new user record
                                RETURNINGs INSERTed user record
                            API server
                                returns RETURNINGed user record
                    output
                        INSERTed user record                     
            private (to authenticated users)
                proxied resources (of NPM Public Registry API)
                    /{packages}
                    /{packages}/{version}
                    /-/v1/search
                /usages
                    is usage (of this API) data
                        logs of
                            HTTP request headers
                            HTTP response headers
                            HTTP response body
